outputs.output_descr: The project aims to build the capacity of TMAC in the following areas: (1) strategic planning, information management and coordination; (2) effective and accelerated mine clearance through better prioritization; (3) improvement of livelihoods for vulnerable groups in mine affected areas; and (4) enhancement of partnership to support landmine clearance and the reduction of community vulnerability. The overall result is that TMAC will have necessary systems in place with enhanced skills and capacity to plan strategically, set correct priorities, implement activites and coordinate with stakeholders well in order that safe communities will be achieved and local livelihoods are improved.

project_descr: Capacity Building to Support Thailand Mine Action Centre (TMAC)
project_title: Capacity building to support Thailand Mine Action Centre
